package.name: Nik_Newsletterpopup
package.summary: Newsletter subscription popup see when customers visit your site. And get Discount Coupon after subscription.
package.description:
Newsletter Subscription with Discount Coupon Newsletter Popup extension is help in achieving more subscribers for your newsletter system by a newsletter form popup on your store homepage. In other words, it is now easy for you to attract leading customers who are actually interested in your services and products.
Allow customer to make subscription for your newsletter emails in the first landing at your store Newsletter Popup is developed using jQuery compatible with Magento. After the installation has been successfully manipulated, it will display a popup automatically when customers visit your Magento home page. By this way, customers can subscribe email to Magento newsletter system via the popup form
Hide the newsletter popup in the following cases In the backend, you can configure the module to hide the popup after:
Customers subscribe their email Customers close the popup You can avoid customer annoyance by turning on the “disable after closing” function. In details, this feature makes sure that customers will see the popup one time until cookie become expired.
Allow a store owner to customize popup easily. Get more subscribers with coupon code Allow store owner to create & send coupon codes to subscribers in newsletter subscription emails. This configuration allows you to define parameters to create coupon code automatically.
Additional configuration: Display the popup after X seconds: That means the popup is only shown after customer visit your homepage for X seconds Allow to enable/disable jQuery to avoid conflict problems Flexible content setup Admin can select between 2 options: display newsletter form or content from a static block in the popup Admin can enable the popup in all pages or only store homepage
Note: Please install module files inside your theme.
